🕉️ What is Muladhara?

• "Mula" = Root/base
• "Adhara" = Support/foundation
Location: Base of spine
Element: Earth 🌍
Color: Red 🔴
Frequency: ~256 Hz (C Note)

Balanced: Grounded, safe, present
Imbalanced: Anxious, scattered, fearful
